Thanks Colin,

This was very surprising to hear. All of the time I tried di=
fferent 
parameter settings as I thought they were crucial for evolution to=
 go 
"right". 
This means that I did look for the error in the entirely wro=
ng 
direction. Your idea with output/input not representing the actual 
val=
ue seems like a good starting point to me. I will look over my 
code again =
with that in mind. 
Thanks a lot for your help!

With best regards,
Matthia=
